    • Game

      public Game(int numPlayers) throws SyntaxException, FileNotFoundException, DeckException
      Constructs a new Game with the specified number of players.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if there is a syntax error in the game setup
      FileNotFoundException - if a required file is not found
      DeckException - if there is an error with the deck

      Sets up the game with the specified player names and set up game items.
      Parameters:
      playerNames - the list of player names
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the setup
      Throws:
      DeckException - if there is an error with the deck

    • chooseGoalPhase

      public String chooseGoalPhase(ArrayList<GoalCard> playersGoalCardChoosen, ArrayList<StarterCard> starterCardFacePosition)
      Executes the goal selection phase for the players, set private goal and starter card for the player and apply player setup.
      Parameters:
      playersGoalCardChoosen - the list of goal cards chosen by the players
      starterCardFacePosition - the list of starter card face positions
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the goal phase

    • executeTurn

      public String executeTurn(String playerName, Position position, PlayableCard playableCard, boolean deckType, int indexDeck) throws JsonException, DeckException, SyntaxException
      Executes a turn for the specified player and decide it self if is player final turn or not.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player
      position - the position to place the card
      playableCard - the card to be played
      deckType - the type of deck (true for golden, false for normal)
      indexDeck - the index of the card in the deck
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the turn
      Throws:
      JsonException - if there is a JSON error
      DeckException - if there is an error with the deck
      SyntaxException - if there is a syntax error
